# Pros

- Native support for numerical and categorical features, and no necessary need for feature pre-processing.

- GBT are fast and light-weight and with great performance.


# Cons

- GBT can overfit.

- Decision tree trained sequentially -> slower training.

- GBT cannot learn & reuse internal representations.Poor performance on image and long text.
